name: Image Display
format: {{msg.payload.date}}

name: Error Check
func:
if (msg.payload.code == 0) return msg;
return null;

name: Add Timestamp
compile settings
InitCameraSettings
Get sh
Store Setting
Get co
Get br
Get sa
Get ISO
Get ev
Get ss
Get rot
Get ex
Get awb
Get ifx
Get mm
InitSingleImageSettings
Get t
Store Setting
Get w
Get h
Get q
sec to msec
Incr Still
Store Still counter
func:
global.set('stillImageCounter', msg.payload);
return msg;

name: Reset Still counter
func:
global.set('stillImageCounter', '0000');
return {'topic':'stillImageCounter','payload':'0000'};

name: Disable
func:
msg.enabled = false;
return msg;

name: Enable
func:
msg.enabled = true;
return msg;

name: Find USB Stick
InitTimelapseSettings
Store Setting

Get h
Get q
Get d
Store timelapse counter
func:
global.set('timelapseCounter', msg.payload);
return msg;

name: compile settings
Incr Timelapse
Get t
sec to msec
Reset Timelapse counter
func:
global.set('timelapseCounter', '0000');
return {'topic':'timelapseCounter','payload':'0000'};

name: Start Counting
Init Loop State
func:
flow.set('loopRunning',false);
return null;
